full_text: Minister Smyth tells Climate Committee he doesn't see National Broadband Ireland meeting their target of passing 59,432 premises by the end of Jan. 2022.   The 59,432 figure was reduced from an initial target of 102,000, and was agreed only a matter of months ago.  A total mess. https://t.co/QlyfI1zVn5

In advance of their defence of hiking Carbon Tax on Tues, it's worth pointing out that in 2019 Govt. committed to retrofitting 500k homes by 2030 - so about 50k a year.   To mid-Sept, they've 5,600 completed in 2021. At this rate, they'll miss their target by >40k at year's end.
